scripts.start: cross-env MODE=local S=0 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
scripts.server1: cross-env MODE=server S=1 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.server2: cross-env MODE=server S=2 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.server3: cross-env MODE=server S=3 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.server4: cross-env MODE=server S=4 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.test: cross-env MODE=test node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
